name: documate-vitepress-starter
description: A template for creating a new VitePress site with Documate

scripts.docs:build:prod: NODE_ENV=production BUILD_ENV=production node scripts/build-config.js && vitepress build
scripts.docs:build:https: NODE_ENV=production BUILD_ENV=production BACKEND_URL=https://backend.philtompkins.com node scripts/build-config.js && vitepress build
